section.title:
pick lists
printing of Print Pick List
section.para: A pick list is a printed list showing the work order material requirements for a specified work order. To print a pick list, go to Manufacture > Forms > Print Pick List. The following screen will appear:
When printing a pick list, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the work order number of the work order you want to print a pick list for.
Displays site code automatically when work order number is entered into Work Order # field.
Displays item number automatically when work order number is entered into Work Order # field.
Displays work order status automatically when work order number is entered into Work Order # field.
Indicates work order method is either assembly or disassembly.
Select a number using the arrows or manually enter a value up to a maximum of 99. Specify the number of copies of the pick list you want to print.
